story.title: Our Story
content: At PureVue Window Cleaning, we’re more than a window cleaning service—we’re a team of ambitious students with a vision to raise the standard in our industry. Founded in Bristol, WI, PureVue was built on the belief that homeowners deserve premium, hassle-free service while students gain meaningful opportunities to lead, learn, and grow. We take pride in combining professional results with a fresh approach to customer care.

Through our internship program, students gain real-world experience in sales, leadership, marketing, and professionalism. Every pane we polish reflects not only our commitment to detail and excellence, but also our mission to help the next generation of leaders develop skills that last far beyond the classroom. Our work is about more than clean windows—it’s about building confidence, careers, and brighter futures.

Choosing PureVue means choosing more than sparkling glass—it means supporting a program that empowers students while delivering unmatched service to your home. From Racine to Milwaukee and beyond, we bring clear views, reliable care, and the promise of a team invested in your satisfaction. With PureVue, your windows shine brighter, and so does the next generation.
